field.name: measureTypeId
field.remark: Measure type The following are recommended enumeration 1:duration 2:volume 3:number of times 4:piece 5:count 6:bonus 101:SDR 102:USD 103:EURO 104:CNY 111:THB 112:VND

field.name: measureId
field.remark:
?????????????
Measure ID: A unique identifier For example:
101 millisecond 102 Sec 103 byte 104 KB 105 MB 109 Piece 202 Sec 301 times 501 Point 601 Points 701 Days 801 MB/Sec 1901 times 10101 SDR 10201 Cent 10202 Dollar 10301 Cent 10302 Euro 10401 Hao 10402 Li 10403 Fen 10404 Yuan 11100 Satang/10 11101 Satang 11102 Baht 20101 Kpbs 20102 Mpbs
